name: The Great Path
description:
The Story

A short story in a fantasy world, featuring Sulkie, an orphaned girl who wanders the world following the Great Path of her imagination.

Where is she from? Even she doesn't know the answer to that question. She has more pressing things on her mind, such as how she's going to pay for bread.

Features

Almost 6000 words, easy to play in one sitting.

Six story branches.

A poor girl who needs your help.

Like Sulkie?

Follow Sulkie on Twitter (@SulkieB) to learn about her ongoing adventures in Waterdeep. Get live updates, have conversations with her, and take part in daily polls!

Please support me so I can keep making stories! ヽ( ˊ ᵕ ˋ)ﾉ.｡.:*☆
